means: 款待，招待( entertain的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: They were entertained by top singers, dancers and celebrities.
sentence.Network_cn: 顶级歌手、舞蹈演员和名人们给他们带来娱乐。

sentence.Network_en: He treated them seriously and, on occasion, entertained them hilariously.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对待他们严肃认真，偶尔又逗得他们捧腹不已。

sentence.Network_en: He entertained his readers by lampooning the pretensions of the rich.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以冷嘲热讽自以为是的有钱人来愉悦读者。

PerfectNetExp.abs: because we try to rewrite the articles from the weeklies in completely natural English that will keep readers The Japan Times entertained .因为我们试着改写的文章都来自英语本土周刊，而这些文章也是日本时报销量的保证。

the Village Center at Dameisha is a coming together of people and their environment in a vital street where the local community can meet , shop , play , relax and be entertained .大梅沙社区中心是一个人们可以聚集的充满活力的街道，当地的社区民众能够会面、购物、游玩、休息和娱乐的场所。
The children entertained us with songs and dances ., 孩子们以歌舞节目招待我们.
Even after failing twice , we still entertained a hope of success ., 即使我们失败了两次 , 我们仍怀有成功的希望.

list.abs: 英语四级复习资料 - 豆丁网 ... plot 情节 entertaining 有趣的，愉快的； enthusiastic 热情的 5、外出就餐：.
大学英语精读单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... entertainment n. 娱乐 entertain vt. 娱乐，招待 solve vt. 解决(问题).
待字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 对待〖 treat;dealwith〗 招待〖 entertain〗 需要〖 need〗.
生活英语单词大全 - 豆丁网 ... 雷鬼， Bob Marley。 Fushion： 艺人 entertainer 剧本 screenplay.
新编大学英语单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... elation n. 兴高采烈，洋洋得意 entertainer n. (娱乐节目的)表演者 hasten v. 加快.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... contain v 招待；娱乐 entertainment 娱乐，款待 detain v 阻拦；拘留.
Meanwhile there are many museums and entertainment center , catering s and bars ., 区内亦设有多个博物馆和文娱中心 , 饮食业和酒吧等也相当蓬勃.

entry.tran: 使快乐；给…以娱乐；使有兴趣
entry.def: If a performer, performance, or activity entertains you, it amuses you, interests you, or gives you pleasure.

example.tran: 带给孩子们快乐的游戏和想法

example.ex: They were entertained by top singers, dancers and celebrities...
example.tran: 顶级歌手、舞蹈演员和名人们给他们带来娱乐。

entry.def: If you entertain people, you provide food and drink for them, for example when you have invited them to your house.

example.ex: I don't like to entertain guests anymore...
example.tran: 我再也不想招待客人了。

example.ex: You weren't allowed to entertain men in your rooms even with a chaperone...
example.tran: 即使你有监护人陪同，也不允许在房间里招待男性。

entry.tran: 考虑，心存，怀有（主意、建议等）
entry.def: If you entertain an idea or suggestion, you allow yourself to consider it as possible or as worth thinking about seriously.

example.ex: I feel how foolish I am to entertain doubts...
example.tran: 我竟然心存怀疑，真是太愚蠢了。

example.ex: I wouldn't entertain the idea of such an unsociable job.
example.tran: 我不会考虑从事这种不跟人打交道的工作。

auth_sentence.content: Morales keeps him entertained with stories all day long.
auth_sentence.res_content: Morales keeps him entertained with stories all day long.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Morales keeps him entertained with stories all day long.

auth_sentence.content: Merrie Paulsen wasn't entertained by Patty's storytelling.
auth_sentence.res_content: Merrie Paulsen wasn't entertained by Patty's storytelling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Merrie Paulsen wasn't entertained by Patty's storytelling.

auth_sentence.content: We must love to be entertained and be lied to!
auth_sentence.res_content: We must love to be entertained and be lied to!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We must love to be entertained and be lied to!
